snippet: Yennifez Marte was the unintended victim in a gang-related shooting in 2008. After a long, painful recovery, she has found a new job and permanent housing for her daughters.
abstract: Semiperm Housing helps Yennifez Marte to find apartment in Manhattan following period of homelessness caused by post-traumatic stress disorder; organization is supported by Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Yennifez Marte was the unintended victim in a gang-related shooting in 2008. After a long, painful recovery, she has found a new job and permanent housing for her daughters.

headline.print_headline: Mother of Three Regains Footing After Being Shot
headline.main: Mother of 3 Regains Her Footing After Being Shot
